preferences.name: api_token
preferences.title: API Token
preferences.description: Admin Token generated via Keygen API

commands.name: licenses
commands.title: Licenses
commands.description: List Licenses and Create new ones

commands.name: policies
commands.title: Policies
commands.description: List Policies and Create new ones

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
